name: Crime Lizard
description: Crime Lizard is a fully on-chain gaming ecosystem built on BNB Chain. The platform features provably fair casino games including dice and slots with smart contract payouts, alongside a text-based RPG where players battle monsters, engage in PvP combat, complete quests, and participate in multiplayer boss raids. Players mint NFT characters with AI-generated artwork and customisable names. All in-game gold, experience points, equipment, and character stats are stored on-chain with the NFT, enabling full ownership and secondary market trading. The ecosystem includes an AI-powered Telegram bot that provides market data tools, token price lookups, community tipping features, and real-time buy notifications with AI-generated commentary. The Telegram integration is bidirectional, allowing players to interact with the community from within the game interface.
